column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I've been to Common Bond a few times now
column2: and I enjoy it every single time. That being said
column3: the Chicken Tortas I order today is good
column4: but not exceptional. The Telera Roll is hearty and spongy
column5: doing very well in holding all the guac
column10: lettuce. I prefer buns like these that do not disintegrate as you bite through the sandwich or burger
